CommandDefinition.Name: registerorderinputsourcetype
CommandDefinition.Description: Registers an additional order input source type implementation.

Argument.Name: name
Argument.Description: The name of the order input source type implementation. There must exist a corresponding subdirectory with the same name under server/orderinputsourcetypes/ containing the jar-file(s) of the order input source type implementation.

Argument.Name: fqClassName
Argument.Description: The fully qualified name of the class implementing the OrderInputSourceType interface.
